analysis.description:
StandardToken.allowed (/unique_chucks/6/0xd4de05944572d142fbf70f3f010891a35ac15188.sol#265-266) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- allowance (/unique_chucks/6/0xd4de05944572d142fbf70f3f010891a35ac15188.sol#337-342)

BulDex.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0xd4de05944572d142fbf70f3f010891a35ac15188.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/6/0xd4de05944572d142fbf70f3f010891a35ac15188.sol)

BasicToken.virtualBalance should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xd4de05944572d142fbf70f3f010891a35ac15188.sol#193-197)
BulDex.bullAmount should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xd4de05944572d142fbf70f3f010891a35ac15188.sol#395-401)
